issue.title: [CF 1062] More customization on how bars display
issue.body:
1. I want to track my Health pool with a Bar
2. I want said Bar to display colors and fonts of my choose only on that specific group
3. I want the backdrop on the missing resource (this case my health) to be red and my actual HP to be green

What do you expect to happen? What happens instead?
I want a green bar that goes red on the missing par of the bar

Using TMW 7.2.2

Do you have an error log of what happened?
No, i have this bar as im using it
^1^T^SType^Svalue ^SPowerType^N-1 ^SBackdropAlpha^N1 ^SSettingsPerView^T ^Sbar^T ^STextLayout^STMW:textlayout:1KgpDbcVtTlZ ^STexts^T ^N1^S ^N2^S[Value:Short~`"/"~`ValueMax:Short] ^t^t^t^SCustomTex^SNONE ^SEnabled^B ^t^N72218^S~`~| ^Sicon^^

Being able to choose bar colors more easily would be nice and make so bar textures only affect certain groups would be cool too
